amendment.description: To address interment schedule availability at cemetaries under the control of the National Cemetary Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3082 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3082 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 3411. To address interment schedule availability at cemetaries under the control of the National Cemetary Administration.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3082 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3082 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
